post.title: Pelosi announces bill to empower Congress to remove president from office

body:
This woman is insane, evil, and attacking the constitution.  There s 3 main reasons she'd propose this:

* To block the supreme court nomination.  Even if she got this passed, it wouldn't work, because Pence would be President.
* Because she's 3rd in line for the Presidency, a giant conflict of interest.  Can you imagine her ever winning the presidency legitimately?  I can't.
* Because Democrats will lose in November, and they know it.

The democrats have already shown their hand that they're willing to rewrite the entire constitution and rule-book to ensure their permanent power, no matter what.  Supreme court packing.  The power to get rid of an elected president on a whim.  These are just the things we know about.  If they actually do establish a majority and win the presidency, the US, the constitution, and democracy are probably completely fucked.  When she labeled conservatives as enemies of the united states, she was showing her hand.  She would probably murder us if she could get away with it.

This woman is insane, evil, and attacking the constitution. There s 3 main reasons she'd propose this:

  • To block the supreme court nomination. Even if she got this passed, it wouldn't work, because Pence would be President.
  • Because she's 3rd in line for the Presidency, a giant conflict of interest. Can you imagine her ever winning the presidency legitimately? I can't.
  • Because Democrats will lose in November, and they know it.

The democrats have already shown their hand that they're willing to rewrite the entire constitution and rule-book to ensure their permanent power, no matter what. Supreme court packing. The power to get rid of an elected president on a whim. These are just the things we know about. If they actually do establish a majority and win the presidency, the US, the constitution, and democracy are probably completely fucked. When she labeled conservatives as enemies of the united states, she was showing her hand. She would probably murder us if she could get away with it.

body:
Yep, exactly the kind of scenario I was thinking of.  

Whenever you trot out a new weapon to wield, you must *always* consider how it could be used against you.  Always.  

Which is why I've been a little wary of folks on the Right cheering on unidentified government agents snatching Antifa off of the street and throwing them into unmarked vans.  On an emotional level, it's satisfying.  As a *precedent*, it's nothing I want to promote since at some point in the future the "mob" could be patriotic Americans protesting restrictive laws, excessive taxes, illegal lockdowns, or food shortages.
